data.text: @BAMsPG You kept that series going for longer than most 👌
@BAMsPG Call the next video how a "X amount  of hours" Player Dominated a server

@BAMsPG The fact that the person said “could have waited until the next day” shows that they’ve never even played PvP ark. 

Wait until the next day and you’re gonna wake up to a respawn screen lmaooo.
@BAMsPG Countless thousands of hours? Interesting lol.
@BAMsPG Should have done a Twitter like give away of the base or something

@BAMsPG It was the best decision indeed. That kid probably was writing that comment about himself, all they do is rage and expect everyone to do the same, when they dont know a sh!t about how to handle these situations like an adult.

@BAMsPG You only lose if the raiding tribe gets your shit. I would of done the same. You got out and gave your stuff to the next tribe. If your tribe mates wanna bitch next time log in and defend the base instead of claiming “insiding”

People think they know everything as if I don’t have countless thousands of hours in this game. I know when to give up and I know when I can keep going. Anyone with a brain would tell you what I did was the best decision.
